review: Love this thing! While we do have a smart TV that provides some of the functionality, the device add new layers of connectivity that the TV doesn't natively support such as the ability to share my laptop screen on the TV which really cool for my flight simulator. Add to that that any device we have can share multimedia to the TV expanding our Internet and entertainment options
